sentences.en: a battery of medical tests
sentences.cn: 一组医疗化验

sentences.en: a battery-operated hairdryer
sentences.cn: 使用电池的吹风机

sentences.en: an anti-aircraft battery
sentences.cn: 防空炮

sentences.en: Crack is part of a battery of drugs used by addicts.
sentences.cn: 强效可卡因是瘾君子们吸食的众多毒品之一。

sentences.en: Does your battery need recharging?
sentences.cn: 你的电池需要充电 吗 ?

sentences.en: He is charging a storage battery.
sentences.cn: 他在为蓄电池充电.

sentences.en: He is using your mains electricity to recharge his car battery.
sentences.cn: 他在用你家里的电源给他的车载蓄电池充电。

sentences.en: I have a battery tester in my garage.
sentences.cn: 我的车库里有台电池测试仪。

sentences.en: I thought it looked as though the battery was going.
sentences.cn: 我看电池好像该换了。

sentences.en: It is mains or battery powered.
sentences.cn: 它是由电源或者电池供电的。

sentences.en: The battery charger plugs into any mains socket.
sentences.cn: 这个电池充电器可以插入任何类型的电源插座.

sentences.en: The battery in my car gave up the ghost.
sentences.cn: 我的汽车电池报废了。

sentences.en: The car’s got a flat battery .
sentences.cn: 汽车的蓄电池没电了。

sentences.en: They stopped beside a battery of abandoned guns.
sentences.cn: 他们在一排废弃火炮旁停了下来。

sentences.en: They told me I needed a new battery.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉我需要换新电池。

sentences.en: This battery booster is a boon for photographers.
sentences.cn: 这种电池充电器是摄影工作者的好帮手。

sentences.en: Use the crocodile clips to attach the cables to the battery.
sentences.cn: 用鳄鱼嘴夹把电缆接到蓄电池上。

sentences.en: We give a battery of tests to each patient.
sentences.cn: 我们给每个病人都做了一系列的检查。

sentences.en: When the red light comes on, you should recharge the battery .
sentences.cn: 红灯亮起的时候你就应该给电池充电了。

sentences.en: Will you charge up my car battery?
sentences.cn: 你替我把汽车电瓶充一下电好 吗 ?

sentences.en: You have to take the top off to change the batteries .
sentences.cn: 你得把顶盖拿掉才能更换电池。

phrases.tran_cn: 电池充电器；蓄电池充电
电池充电；蓄电池室充电
铅酸蓄电池；铅酸电池；密封蓄电池

trans.tran_en: an object that provides a supply of electricity for something such as a radio, car, or toy
